item.title: Deadly shooting at ICE facility follows trend of sniper-type incidents: Experts
item.description: Law enforcement experts said the sniper-type shooting at a Dallas ICE facility is part of a frightening trend.

item.title: Authorities search for diver who went missing in waters off Hawaii coast
item.description: Authorities in Hawaii say they are looking for a 44-year-old diver who was last seen on Tuesday in the waters near Kauai in Hawaii.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump announces deal to put TikTok under control of US investors
item.description: President Trump on Thursday announced an agreement that will pave the way for social media giant TikTok to come under the control of a group of U.S. i...

item.title: Former FBI Director James Comey posts video after indictment: 'I am innocent'
item.description: In a video posted following his two-count indictment by a federal grand jury, former FBI Director James Comey says he is innocent.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
